message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you get $40. A fair deal to start.
Let's try to meet in the middle, I get 55, you get 45, we both win!
I understand you want a larger share, but time is money! This is my final offer - let's close the deal.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm willing to take a risk. I'll take 57, you get 43. Last chance!
